name: Last Hours Of Your Life
description:
LHOYL is a short text based game made for game jam about "grey" person getting "poisoned" by X while having Y time to escape in order to have any chances of survival

 You can get 1 ending in less than a minute if you skip reading everything and you know what to do

 Gameplay is mostly just "try and try again until you get everything right"

- You use only mouse to play 

- There 9 locations which 2 of them are traps

- There are a few options that mostly just waste your time

- Your main enemy is time 

There are a few sounds effect (my first ever made so they are trash) but there's no music

Game has 2 full and 1 poor made endings

Game has a few bugs as i ran out of time to fix them 

I am planning on reworking this game one day... (maybe in a month, year or idk when)
